action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of stylized blocks arranged in a grid. The blocks represent the letters "HAPPY" and a smiley face. The colors used are purple, green, orange, and a light pink. The background is white, and the blocks are the main focus of the graphic, with no additional elements or background detail.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image displays a group of pixelated Tetris block shapes, each with a distinct color. Starting from the top left, there is a horizontally stretched purple "T" block, then an orange "T"-shaped block directly below it. To the right of the orange block, an upright "T" block in green is present. Adjacent to the green, another upside-down green "T" block is visible. A pink rectangle block is positioned to the far right at the bottom. All these are against a white background, making the colors and shapes clearly distinguishable.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of stylized blocks arranged in a grid. The blocks represent the letters "HAPPY" and a smiley face. The colors used are purple, green, orange, and a light pink. The background is white, and the blocks are the main focus of the graphic, with no additional elements or background detail.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.

Based on the description, my image contains specific Tetris block shapes without any direct representation of letters or a smiley face. However, your image seems to contain blocks that are intentionally shaped to represent letters and a smiley face. 

QUESTION: Do any of the shapes in your image have a particular arrangement or pattern that signifies letters or symbols that can be read as text?
